name: TI_2_1_3_9_Maintenance_Started_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.9 Maintenance Started System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track maintenance started event.
purpose: Capture maintenance started event, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when maintenance is initiated, including down time.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.9#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
